palette.title: P.S I love you CL
palette.description: Dear All My Followers or not, I am writing this message to tell you how much I appreciate you ,your works and your writings.I know my life before was some 3,547,133 Colors (splashed in 1,489,220 Palettes and turned into 1,346,026 Patterns) less colourful.Now I am happier at least 300 times more. Please,always take few minutes from your time and read(not only glance at)my colours because they aren't only colours any more.They carry info,quotes,photos and lots of feelings sometimes.Yours tell me stories too and often even write books in my mind.Magical realism.I love each page and each line in those stories that feed my greedy,insatiable human senses. Life is the 7th sense for me.My perception of pain, direction and balance;of vibration, light, water,colour and scents give me the ability to sense the world around me.Can't stand frames and explainig myself exhausts me completely. Thank God I am having the chance to know you.Happy to colour with you. Love, Albena J chalenge yourselves each day and try moving--
